title: Ahmed Rashid - Afghanistan and Pakistan: The Re-emergence of the Taliban and the Arrival of ISIS
desc: NATO has officially ended its combat mission in Afghanistan, but the Taliban has launched a new offensive and ISIS is making inroads in the region as well. Ahmed Rashid, one of Pakistan's most respected journalists, will make sense of these developments and more. What is reason for this terrifying resurgence? How are Afghans and Pakistanis reacting? is the author of the best-selling books   and  , among other titles.
